title: riverdip
author: riverdip
created_time: April 23, 2023, 06:23:23 PMLast edit: April 26, 2023, 01:58:26 PM by riverdip

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: First of all, stop bumping your thread with multiple posts in a row, it is against the rules.Quote from: riverdip on April 23, 2023, 06:23:23 PMOur website, puputoken.com, contains all the information you need to get started with PUPU, including our whitepaper and roadmap. We are also active on social media platforms, so be sure to follow us on Twitter and join our Telegram group to stay up-to-date with the latest developments.I checked out your website and I must say, I did not find a whitepaper or roadmap anywhere! Are you guys trying to keep the suspense going? Or is it just a covert strategy? I am sure you have some top-secret plans up your sleeves for revolutionizing DeFi with your POOPU (sorry I meant to say pupu) token, right? All jokes aside, when it comes to investing your hard-earned money, it is always important to do your due diligence. So, until PUPU decides to provide us with a little more information, I think I'll stick to good old advice: only invest in projects with a solid track record and a clear vision for the future.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: riverdip on April 23, 2023, 06:23:23 PMOur website, puputoken.com, contains all the information you need to get started with PUPU, including our whitepaper and roadmap. Quote from: riverdip on April 23, 2023, 10:58:11 PMWhile we do not have a traditional whitepaper or roadmap, we do have a clear vision for PUPU. Dude, you are literally contradicting yourself.And what is your vision, really? Is it more of a throw-it-and-see-what-sticks approach, or do you have a more deliberate plan in mind?
